'''Bob''' was the boyfriend of [[Angela Delveccio|Angela]] after she and [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] broke up, portrayed by [[Jack Armstrong]]. 

Bob grew up in Cleveland, Ohio. Bob and Angela went on a double date with Joey and [[Monica Geller|Monica]] in "[[The One With The East German Laundry Detergent]]". Joey had told Monica that he was Angela's brother. By the end of the episode, Joey and Monica have broken Bob and Angela up and taken the pieces for themselves.
